LehmanaMod:CommonPower.NAME: Buxom
DESCRIPTIONS: Breast size increased. Used for various effects. 5% chance to gain a random status card per stack.

LehmanaMod:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b
enemy.
enemies.

block.

block.

LehmanaMod:MCupPower.NAME: M-Cup Bra

LehmanaMod:ChibiPower.NAME: Chibi
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a skill, gain an effect at random equal to its cost: NL gain Buxom, gain Chibi, deal damage to one enemy equal to your Chibi.

LehmanaMod:ButtonHazardPower.NAME: Button Hazard
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b
to a random enemy whenever you gain Buxom.

LehmanaMod:ReliefPower.NAME: Relief
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
Block whenever you Exhaust a card.

LehmanaMod:MeasurementTime.NAME: Measurement Time
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b
Block. NL Decreases each time your lehmanamod:Buxom increases.

LehmanaMod:ShockPower.NAME: Omega Shock
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you have a Status card in your hand, deal damage equal to your lehmanamod:Buxom to a random enemy.

LehmanaMod:TCupPower.NAME: T-Cup Bra
DESCRIPTIONS: lehmanamod:Capacity 10-15. NL Gain [E] and #b
Dexterity each time your Buxom increases. If this bra breaks, lose all your Dexterity.
